snippet.title: SimCity 4 (PC) Gameplay 1/3
snippet.description:
Review:
Great game! Buildings are still 2D but cars and landscapes are now 3D! You can build army base and destroy your city with a tank! More disasters - more fun...
Programs Used:
SimCity 4 Deluxe Edition
FRAPS
VirtualDub
Links:
http://www.youtube.com/aidar95 - if you sub me I'll sub YOU!
http://www.cool-goat.blogspot.com - my blog
http://www.playfire.com/Cool_Goat - my games
http://cool-goat.ucoz.ru/ - my Russian site
https://twitter.com/CoolGoat - follow me on Twitter!
